name: Focused Writer
description:
Resizes toolbar to fit in one line at 1080x1920 resolution by removing the compact mode switch button. Just use ctrl+shift+f to switch.

Also sets a darker background color, removes all of the page borders, and sets table border colors to a light silver gray.
